DIF.Entry_Title: ASTER L1B Registered Radiance at the Sensor V003

Instrument.Long_Name: Advanced Spaceborne Thermal Emission and Reflection Radiometer

Summary.Abstract:
The ASTER Level-1B Registered Radiance at the Sensor product contains radiometrically calibrated and geometrically co-registered data for the acquired channels of the three different telescopes of Level-1A data. The Level-1B data set is produced by applying the radiometric calibration and geometric correction coefficients to the Level-1A. Both intra-telescope and inter-telescope registration correction for all the Bands are accomplished relative to the reference Band for each sub-system (Bands 2, 6, and 11). The Level-1B radiance data set offers the same number of Bands at the same resolution as the Level-1A, and provides the input for generating a number of derived Level-2 geophysical products.
Users are advised that ASTER SWIR data acquired from late April 2008 to the present exhibit anomalous saturation of values and anomalous striping. This effect is also present for some prior acquisition periods. Please refer to the ASTER SWIR User Advisory Document at https://lpdaac.usgs.gov/sites/default/files/public/aster/docs/ASTER_SWIR_User_Advisory_July%2018_08.pdf for more details.
V003 data set release date: 2002-05-03
Data Set Characteristics: Area: ~60 km x 60 km Image Dimensions: VNIR: 4200 rows x 4980 columns VNIR (3B): 4600 rows x 4980 columns SWIR: 2100 rows x 2490 columns TIR: 700 rows x 830 columns File Size: VNIR (1,2,3N): ~60 MB VNIR (3B): ~22 MB SWIR (4-9): ~30 MB TIR (10-14): ~6 MB Total: 118 Megabytes Spatial Resolution: VNIR: 15m SWIR: 30m TIR: 90m Units: w/m2/sr/Âµm Projection: Universal Transverse Mercator (UTM) Data Format: HDF-EOS, GeoTIFF Vgroup Data Fields: 15

Related_URL.Description: Data set landing page at the LP DAAC
Interface to search, discover, and access EOS data products, and invoke available data services.
LP DAAC Data Pool provides direct access to all currently available products and the ability to download them via HTTP.

USGS EarthExplorer (EE) provides users the ability to query, search and order archived ASTER and MODIS products available from the LP DAAC. Registered users of EE have access to additional features than guest users.

The USGS Global Visualization Viewer (GloVis) is an online search and order tool driven by browse images. Users may select any geographical area of interest (for any given product) and view all available browse images for that area before deciding to order those products.

The Land Processes Distributed Active Archive Center (LP DAAC) is one of several discipline-specific data centers within the NASA Earth Observing System Data and Information System (EOSDIS). The LP DAAC Web page provides information about available data products, services, documentation, order interfaces, and tools.
The ASTER home page is maintained through NASA's Jet Propulsion Laboratory and documents various aspects of the ASTER mission.

Additional_Attributes.Name: ASTERMapProjection
Additional_Attributes.Description: The map projection of the granule

Additional_Attributes.Name: DAR_ID
Additional_Attributes.Description: ID of the Data Acquisition Request

Additional_Attributes.Name: GenerationDateandTime
Additional_Attributes.Description: Date and Time granule produced

Additional_Attributes.Name: LowerLeftQuadCloudCoverage
Additional_Attributes.Description: The percentage of cloud coverage for the lower left quadrant

Additional_Attributes.Name: LowerRightQuadCloudCoverage
Additional_Attributes.Description: The percentage of cloud coverage for the lower right quadrant

Additional_Attributes.Name: SceneCloudCoverage
Additional_Attributes.Description: Percentage of cloud coverage for the whole scene

Additional_Attributes.Name: Solar_Azimuth_Angle
Additional_Attributes.Description: Angle of the sun clockwise from true North

Additional_Attributes.Name: Solar_Elevation_Angle
Additional_Attributes.Description: Angle of the sun above the horizon

Additional_Attributes.Name: SWIR_ObservationMode
Additional_Attributes.Description: Indicates whether the SWIR sensor group is ON or OFF

Additional_Attributes.Name: TIR_ObservationMode
Additional_Attributes.Description: Indicates whether the TIR sensor group is ON or OFF

Additional_Attributes.Name: UpperLeftQuadCloudCoverage
Additional_Attributes.Description: The percentage of cloud coverage for the upper left quadrant

Additional_Attributes.Name: UpperRightQuadCloudCoverage
Additional_Attributes.Description: The percentage of cloud coverage for the upper right quadrant

Additional_Attributes.Name: VNIR1_ObservationMode
Additional_Attributes.Description: Indicates whether the VNIR1 sensor group is ON or OFF

Additional_Attributes.Name: VNIR2_ObservationMode
Additional_Attributes.Description: Indicates whether the VNIR2 sensor group is ON or OFF

Additional_Attributes.Name: RadiometricDBVersion
Additional_Attributes.Description: The version number of the Radiometric Database used in Level 1 processing.

Additional_Attributes.Name: GeometricDBVersion
Additional_Attributes.Description: The version number of the Geometric Database used in Level 1 processing.

Additional_Attributes.Name: ASTERGains
Additional_Attributes.Description: Identifies the Gain setting for the Bands: HGH, NOR, LO1, LO2, LOW, OFF

Additional_Attributes.Name: ASTERProcessingCenter
Additional_Attributes.Description: Name of the center where these ASTER data were processed

Additional_Attributes.Name: ASTERVNIRPointingAngle
Additional_Attributes.Description: Specifies the pointing angle of the ASTER Visible Near Infrared (VNIR) sensor

Additional_Attributes.Name: ASTERSWIRPointingAngle
Additional_Attributes.Description: Specifies the pointing angle of the ASTER Shortwave Infrared (SWIR) sensor

Additional_Attributes.Name: ASTERTIRPointingAngle
Additional_Attributes.Description: Specifies the pointing angle of the ASTER Thermal Infrared (TIR) sensor

Additional_Attributes.Name: ASTERMapOrientationAngle
Additional_Attributes.Description: Denotes the angle between the path oriented image and the map oriented image for this ASTER scene.

Additional_Attributes.Name: ASTERReceivingCenter
Additional_Attributes.Description: Name of the center where these ASTER data were received

Additional_Attributes.Name: source_granule_ur
Additional_Attributes.Description: Granule-ur of the source granule
